text: As the pandemic pressed on into the first month of 2021, Budweiser manufacturer Anheuser-Busch announced it would forgo Super Bowl advertising and allocate funding to COVID-19 vaccination awareness and education instead.
entity_strings: Anheuser-Busch, Budweiser, COVID-19 vaccination, Super Bowl advertising
entities: ['Anheuser-Busch', ' Budweiser', ' COVID-19 vaccination', ' Super Bowl advertising']

text: Budweiser is giving away a free beer to people who can prove they are vaccinated against COVID-19.
Anheuser-Busch will give away free beer when 70% of the nation's adults have had at least one COVID-19 vaccine shot.
